ValidationRule.description: When Opportunity Status is marked as Active, require at least one product of interest.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", ISPICKVAL( Opportunity_Status__c , "Active"), ISBLANK( Products_of_Interest__c ), ( CreatedDate <> NOW() ), $RecordType.Name = "ReadyTalk Opportunity", NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Yahoo! This is no longer a prospect opp (congrats)! Let us know what products this company is interested in!
